argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvnd.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvnd.5 | |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvnd.6 | |- N = ( normCV ` U ) |
| 4 |  | nvnd.8 | |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_nvzcl | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> Z e. X ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> Z e. X ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( -v ` U ) = ( -v ` U ) |
| 8 | 1, 7, 3, 4 | #P_imsdval | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ Z e. X ) -> ( A D Z ) = ( N ` ( A ( -v ` U ) Z ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( A D Z ) = ( N ` ( A ( -v ` U ) Z ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +v ` U ) = ( +v ` U ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .sOLD ` U ) = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 12 | 1, 10, 11, 7 | #P_nvmval | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ Z e. X ) -> ( A ( -v ` U ) Z ) = ( A ( +v ` U ) ( -u 1 ( .sOLD ` U ) Z ) ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( A ( -v ` U ) Z ) = ( A ( +v ` U ) ( -u 1 ( .sOLD ` U ) Z ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_neg1cn | |- -u 1 e. CC |
| 15 | 11, 2 | #P_nvsz | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ -u 1 e. CC ) -> ( -u 1 ( .sOLD ` U ) Z ) = Z ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> ( -u 1 ( .sOLD ` U ) Z ) = Z ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> ( A ( +v ` U ) ( -u 1 ( .sOLD ` U ) Z ) ) = ( A ( +v ` U ) Z ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( A ( +v ` U ) ( -u 1 ( .sOLD ` U ) Z ) ) = ( A ( +v ` U ) Z ) ) |
| 19 | 1, 10, 2 | #P_nv0rid | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( A ( +v ` U ) Z ) = A ) |
| 20 | 13, 18, 19 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( A ( -v ` U ) Z ) = A ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A ( -v ` U ) Z ) ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
| 22 | 9, 21 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( A D Z ) ) |
